subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Jonny Wilkinson, whose last-gasp drop goal secured the World Cup for England in 2003, will play his final game with Toulon in the Heineken Cup final against Saracens on Saturday.
snippet: Jonny Wilkinson, whose last-gasp drop goal secured the World Cup for England in 2003, will play his final game with Toulon in the Heineken Cup final against Saracens on Saturday.
